title: Goldify
description: A Spotify API based React application which allows users to efficiently create the perfect personal Spotify playlist! This project maintains 100% test coverage, uses Material UI standards, and is built as a responsive application.

title: Album A Day
description: Microservice architecture involving Spring Boot SDK server, Spring Boot Discord Bot client, and React based web app client. Equipped with command listeners and scheduled tasks to always have review data fresh and available. Configured for local and staging environments to allow for multiple stages of testing & QA prior to releasing

title: My Personal Website
description: This very website has seen many additions over the past few months and will continue to be developed on. My goal is of course to build an easy-to-navigate source for the minutia of my life. I think it's not bad so far!
